PATIENT_ID: TEST_HYPO_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 22:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 22:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 32-year-old male, MVC with rollover.
BP 88/55, HR 130, RR 28, GCS 10.
Patient extricated from vehicle in cold weather.
Massive transfusion protocol activated.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-21 22:30:00
Patient taken emergently to OR for damage control laparotomy.
No temperature documented prior to OR.

[OPERATIVE_NOTE] 2026-01-22 00:30:00
Damage control laparotomy performed. Splenic injury repaired.
Patient transferred to ICU post-operatively.
